Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory Reconstructed
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory has begun to run at full capacity after its reconstruction on an expansion basis.
 Various kinds of Unhasu-branded cosmetics produced by it are popular among Pyongyang citizens for their good quality.
 Leader Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to this factory last week. Making the rounds of its modern production processes, he expressed satisfaction with the quality cosmetics.    
 It, located in Phyongchon District, Pyongyang, covers 19,000 square meters. It has cosmetics, toothpaste, soap and other workshops.    
 The skin cream, beauty wash, toothpaste and other articles the main ingredient of which is Kaesong Koryo insam (ginseng) are in great demand. 
 Technicians or experts of the factory account for one fourth of the employees.

Lao Delegation Here
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Central Committee of the National Construction Front of Laos led by Sisavath Keobounphanh, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and chairman of the C.C., the National Construction Front of Laos, arrived here today.
 It was met at the airport by Jo Kyu Il, director of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of the Fatherland, officials concerned and Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Chanpheng Sihaphom.

Greetings to General-Governor of Australia
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, yesterday sent a message of greetings to Michael Jeffery upon his appointment as general-governor of Australia.
 In the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples, the message wished him success in his work.
